errors.error_description: The package name in the pip install command is incorrect (`pysmt-lib` instead of `pysmt`), which will cause the installation to fail.
correction_candidates: The command should be `pip install pysmt`.
The command should be `pip install pySMT`.
The package is named `pysmt`, so the command is `pip install pysmt`.
The correct package name is `pysmt`, not `pysmt-lib`.
errors.golden_answer: The command should be `pip install pysmt`.
